name: Boat's Bizarre Adventure
description:
Boat's Bizarre Adventure is a survival game with a scoring system. You fight monsters and kill bosses. Either aim to shoot everything, or wisely choose only to shoot monsters. 

Key Bindings:
AWSD - to move up, left, right, down
Point and left-click to shoot cannons
Shift - stamina boost

Questions:
Is the boat speed balanced?
Any thoughts on the stamina bar? Should there be more? 
Should we update or modify the scoring system for all objects?


Notes:
Currently, there are a few monsters, later we will implement more.

Developers:
Nathaniel 
Rey
Vincent
Elijah
